about_the_game:
*4 new OST added in the supporter pack on December 1, 2024*

*1 new OST added in the supporter pack on June 28, 2024*

*14 new OSTs、11 new character artworks、11 new additional sketches added in the supporter pack on April 6, 2024*

*11 new OSTs、12 new character artworks、2 new additional sketches added in the supporter pack on October 14, 2023*

★About supporter pack★

The full version of our game "Touhou hero of ice fairy" is now updating, if you like our game, you can purchase our supporter pack to support us, at the same time we prepared some bonus content for our supporters.

★ Contents ★

■ 45+ Original Soundtracks from "Touhou hero of ice fairy".

■ 23+ additional sketches by the illustrator.

■ 67+ character artworks from "Touhou hero of ice fairy".

■ Deepest appreciation from the developers.

* The content of the supporter pack will gradually update with the game's update, and more new content will be added to the supporter pack in the future.

* After purchasing the supporter pack, you can find the content in the root directory folder of the game~
